Uses of Interface
com.mumfrey.webprefs.interfaces.IWebPreferences

  • Packages that use IWebPreferences 
    Package Description
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.modconfig  
    com.mumfrey.webprefs  
    com.mumfrey.webprefs.interfaces  

    • Uses of IWebPreferences in com.mumfrey.liteloader.modconfig

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected IWebPreferences CloudConfig.preferences
      Preferences instance

    • Uses of IWebPreferences in com.mumfrey.webprefs

      Classes in com.mumfrey.webprefs that implement IWebPreferences 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DummyOfflineWebPreferences
      No-op webpreferences set which is returned for nonlocal players when the client is running in offline mode.
      Methods in com.mumfrey.webprefs that return IWebPreferences 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IWebPreferences WebPreferencesManager.getLocalPreferences(boolean privatePrefs)
      Get a public or private preferences collection for the local player.
      IWebPreferences WebPreferencesManager.getPreferences(EntityPlayer player)
      Get a public preferences collection for the specified player.
      IWebPreferences WebPreferencesManager.getPreferences(EntityPlayer player, boolean privatePrefs)
      Get a public or private preferences collection for the specified player, note that accessing a private collection for another player is likely to be prohibited by the service.
      IWebPreferences WebPreferencesManager.getPreferences(GameProfile gameProfile)
      Get a public preferences collection for the specified game profile.
      IWebPreferences WebPreferencesManager.getPreferences(GameProfile gameProfile, boolean privatePrefs)
      Get a public or private preferences collection for the specified game profile, note that accessing a private collection for another player is likely to be prohibited by the service.

    • Uses of IWebPreferences in com.mumfrey.webprefs.interfaces

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IReliableWebPreferences
      Reliable WebPreferences, no this isn't implemented yet
